Venger je hteo, zvao, pitao, ali Bajernu treba nešto drugo
Rastu šanse da Hansi Flik zadrži posao do sledećeg leta

07 Nov 2019

Bajern i Arsen Venger su pregovarali u sredu uveče, tvrdi Bild, ali ništa neće biti od angažmana iskusnog francuskog trenera na klupi šampiona Nemačke.
Urednik SportBilda i najobavešteniji novinar kada je u pitanju minhenski velikan Kristijan Falk objavio je da su Karl Hajnc Rumenige i nekadašnji trener Arsenala sinoć vodili razgovor posle kojeg je šampion Nemačke odustao od dovođenja Profesora.
Na insisitranje Bilda u Bajernu su potvrdili ovu vest:"Arsen Venger je lično pozvao Rumenigea u sredu popodne i izrazio želju da preuzme trenersku funkciju u Bajernu. Naš klub ceni sve što je Venger učinio u Arsenalu, ali on nije opcija za novog trenera Bajerna", rekli su Bildu u Minhenu.
To je, navodi Bild, veliko iznenađenje pogotovo jer je Venger u razgovoru izrazio želju da sarađuje sa Hansijem Flikom koji je imao solidan debi sinoć trijumfom nad Olimpijakosom od 2:0 u Ligi šampiona. Venger nije krio da je zainteresovan za posao ni u izjavi za beIN Sports. "Vođenje tima je moj posao. Naravno da sam zainteresovan za klupu Bajerna", potvrdio je Francuz.
Bild danas navodi da nije isključeno i da, u slučaju dobrog rezultata i protiv Borusije iz Dortmunda, Hansi Flik dobije poverenje da vodi Bajern do sledećeg leta posle čega bi se posao ponudio Eriku ten Hagu (Ajaks) ili Tomasu Tuhelu (Pari Sen Žermen). 
Sportski direktor Hasan Salihamidžić kaže da nema potrebe za žurbom."Mirno ćemo, bez pritiska, izabrati novog trenera, onog koji je pravi izbor po našem mišljenju. Mislim da je trenutno Hansi Flik pravi čovek za nas. On je trenutno trener do daljeg, a posle ćemo videti", zagonetan je Braco.
Potraga u Minhenu se nastavlja...
Foto: Reuters

Wenger wanted to call, ask, but Bayern needed something else
The chances of Hansi Flik keeping his job until next summer are growing

07 Nov 2019

Bayern and Arsen Wenger negotiated on Wednesday night, Bild claims, but nothing will come of the hiring of an experienced French coach on the German champions' bench.
The editor of SportBild and the most well-known journalist when it comes to Munich great Christian Falk has announced that Karl Heinz Rumenige and former Arsenal coach had a conversation last night after which the German champion quit bringing Professor.
At Bild's insistence on Bayern they confirmed this news: "Arsen Wenger personally called on Rumenige on Wednesday afternoon and expressed his desire to take over the coaching function in Bayern. Our club appreciates everything Wenger did at Arsenal, but he is not an option for a new Bayern coach." , they told Bild in Munich.
This is a big surprise, Bild said, especially as Wenger expressed his desire to work with Hansi Flick, who had a solid debut last night with a 2-0 Champions League triumph over Olympiakos. Wenger did not hide his interest in the job or in a statement on beIN Sports. "Running a team is my job. Of course I'm interested in the Bayern bench," the Frenchman confirmed.
Bild states today that it is not excluded and that, in the case of a good result and against Borussia Dortmund, Hansi Flick is credited with leading Bayern until next summer, after which the job would be offered to Eric Ten The Hague (Ajax) or Thomas Tuhel (Paris Saint-Germain).
Sporting director Hasan Salihamidzic says there is no need to rush. "We will peacefully, without pressure, choose a new coach, the one that is the right choice in our opinion. I think Hansi Flik is the right man for us right now. we'll see later, "puzzled Braco.
The pursuit of Munich continues ...
